Rank.Description: Reduces the casting time of your Void Bolt spell by 8% and its mana cost by 10%. Reduces the amount of pushback suffered while casting Void Bolt and Life Leech by 33%.
Reduces the casting time of your Void Bolt spell by 16% and its mana cost by 20%. Reduces the amount of pushback suffered while casting Void Bolt and Life Leech by 66%.
Reduces the casting time of your Void Bolt spell by 24% and its mana cost by 30%. Reduces the amount of pushback suffered while casting Void Bolt and Life Leech by 100%.
Increases the amount of Charge your abilities generate by 5%.
Increases the amount of Charge your abilities generate by 10%.
Increases the amount of Charge your abilities generate by 15%.
Increases the amount of Charge your abilities generate by 20%.
Increases the amount of Charge your abilities generate by 25%.
Increases the damage bonus of Contaminate by 5%.
Increases the damage bonus of Contaminate by 10%.
Increases the benefit your damage over time abilities gain from Spell Power by 4%.
Increases the benefit your damage over time abilities gain from Spell Power by 8%.
Increases the benefit your damage over time abilities gain from Spell Power by 12%.
Your spell casts have a 2% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 100%, mana cost by 40% and its global cooldown to 1s. Can occur once every 3s at most.
Your spell casts have a 4% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 100%, mana cost by 40% and its global cooldown to 1s. Can occur once every 3s at most.
Your spell casts have a 6% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 100%, mana cost by 40% and its global cooldown to 1s. Can occur once every 3s at most.
Your spell casts have an 8% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 100%, mana cost by 40% and its global cooldown to 1s. Can occur once every 3s at most.
Your spell casts have a 10% chance to reduce the cast time of your next spell by 100%, mana cost by 40% and its global cooldown to 1s. Can occur once every 3s at most.
Your damage over time abilities ignore 10% of your target's Resistances.
Your damage over time abilities ignore 20% of your target's Resistances.
Your damage over time abilities ignore 30% of your target's Resistances.
Increases your Base Health by 2%.
Increases your Base Health by 4%.
Increases your Base Health by 6%.
Increases your Base Health by 8%.
Increases your Base Health by 10%.

Ability.Description: Deals 482 Death damage whenever the enemy uses an ability. Can occur up to 5 times. Lasts 15s.

Rank.Description: Neddra's Grasp
Increases the damage of Draining Bolt by 5%, and the healing by 0.5% of your Maximum Health, for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Increases the damage of Draining Bolt by 10%, and the healing by 1% of your Maximum Health, for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.

Ability.Description: Deals 1310 to 1448 Death damage and healing the Mage for 10% of their Maximum Health.

Rank.Description: Draining Bolt

Ability.Description: Deals 1091 to 1206 Death damage after 8s. If a damage over time effect is cleansed from the enemy, Neddra's Torture explodes dealing 1422 to 1571 Death damage to the cleanser and Debilitating them for 3s. Can occur a number of times equal to half the number of the Mage's Death based damage over time effects on the enemy plus 1. Max 4 procs.

Rank.Description: Reduces the global cooldown of your damage over time and Ethereal abilities to 1.25 seconds and their mana cost by 16%. Increases the chance for your damage over time abilities to critically hit by 2%.
Reduces the global cooldown of your damage over time and Ethereal abilities to 1 second and their mana cost by 33%. Increases the chance for your damage over time abilities to critically hit by 4%.
Increases the damage of your damage over time abilities by 3%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 1 meter. Increased range does not stack with the other range increasing effects.
Increases the damage of your damage over time abilities by 6%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 2 meters. Increased range does not stack with the other range increasing effects.
Increases the damage of your damage over time abilities by 9%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 3 meters. Increased range does not stack with the other range increasing effects.

Increases the damage of your damage over time abilities by 12%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 4 meters. Increased range does not stack with the other range increasing effects.

Increases the damage of your damage over time abilities by 15%. Increases the range of non-melee damaging abilities by 5 meters. Increased range does not stack with the other range increasing effects.

Ability.Description: Spreads Dark Touch and Neddra's Grasp to up to 6 additional enemies.

Rank.Description: Radiate Death
Your Mage Armor buffs increase the damage you deal by 2%, in addition to their normal effects.
Your Mage Armor buffs increase the damage you deal by 4%, in addition to their normal effects.
Your Mage Armor buffs increase the damage you deal by 6%, in addition to their normal effects.
Your Mage Armor buffs increase the damage you deal by 8%, in addition to their normal effects.
Your Mage Armor buffs increase the damage you deal by 10%, in addition to their normal effects.
Neddra's Essence

Increases the base damage done by your Life Leech by 20%, the benefit it receives from your Spell power by 20%, the duration by 2 seconds and increases the amount of healing done by an additional 1% of your maximum health.

Increases the base damage done by your Life Leech by 40%, the benefit it receives from your Spell power by 40%, the duration by 4 seconds and increases the amount of healing done by an additional 2% of your maximum health.

Increases the base damage done by your Life Leech by 60%, the benefit it receives from your Spell power by 60%, the duration by 6 seconds and increases the amount of healing done by an additional 3% of your maximum health.
Gives your Primary Bolt abilities a 50% chance to refresh the duration of Life Leech on the enemy.
Gives your Primary Bolt abilities a 100% chance to refresh the duration of Life Leech on the enemy.
Gives your Radiate Death a 33% chance to spread Life Leech, Atrophy, Necrosis, Electrified and Deathly Calling.
Gives your Radiate Death a 66% chance to spread Life Leech, Atrophy, Necrosis, Electrified and Deathly Calling.
Gives your Radiate Death a 100% chance to spread Life Leech, Atrophy, Necrosis, Electrified and Deathly Calling.
Increases your Void Bolt, Neddra's Torture and Void Barrage damage by 2% for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Increases your Void Bolt, Neddra's Torture and Void Barrage damage by 4% for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Increases your Void Bolt, Neddra's Torture and Void Barrage damage by 6% for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Increases your Void Bolt, Neddra's Torture and Void Barrage damage by 8% for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Increases your Void Bolt, Neddra's Torture and Void Barrage damage by 10% for each of your Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.

Ability.Description: Refreshes all of the Mage's active Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Causes the Mage's next 10 Death based damage over time effects to deal an additional 509 to 563 Death damage when they are applied.
Interrupts the enemy and Debilitates for 5s.

AbilityRank.Description: Cast time of next spell reduced by 100%.
Deals 5770 Death damage over 3s. Initial damage refreshes all of the Mage's active Death damage over time effects on the enemy.
Deals 1992 Death damage over 16s. Damage increases each second.
Applies all Death damage over time effects removed by the Mage's Salvage Corruption ability to the enemy.
Removes all of the Mage's Death damage over time effects on the enemy, storing them on the Mage for up to 30s. Stored effects can be reapplied to an enemy using the Deathly Pall ability.

Increases damage done by the Mage's damage over time effects by 20%. Each damage over time ability cast consumes 10 Charge. Damage over time abilities cannot generate Charge while active. Does not trigger a global cooldown.
Refreshes all of the Mage's active Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Deals 1194 to 1319 Death damage. Damage is increased by 20% for each of the caster's Death based damage over time effects on the enemy.
Deals 2299 Death damage over 8s. Can only be used on enemies below 50% health.
Causes the Mage's next 10 Death based damage over time effects to deal an additional 509 to 563 Death damage when they are applied.
Increases damage done by 40% for 15s.
Deals 1310 to 1448 Death damage and healing the Mage for 10% of their Maximum Health.
Spreads Dark Touch and Neddra's Grasp to up to 6 additional enemies.
Deals 1226 Death damage over 10s and heals the Mage for 3% of their maximum health over 10s.
Deals 1686 Death damage over 16s.
Deals 6445 to 7124 Death damage over 6s to up to 5 nearby enemies, healing the Mage for the damage done. Consumes Charge while active. Cannot be affected by crowd control abilities while casting.
Increases damage dealt by damage over time abilities by 5%. When hit, deals 80 Death damage to the attacker. Lasts 1h. Counts as a Mage Armor.
Fears up to 5 nearby enemies for 10s or until damaged.
Deals 4254 Death damage over 6s to up to 8 enemies. Generates 6 Charge every 1s.
Increase Death damage done by 20%, and all other damage done by 10% for 15s. Consumes 15% health.

When hit, deals 80 Death damage to the attacker and restores 30 health. Increases damage done by damage over time abilities by 5%. Grants damaging Death spells a 20% chance to make your next Consuming Agony, within 8s, instant and reduce its mana cost by 50%. Cannot occur more than once every 10s. Lasts 1h. Counts as a Mage Armor.
Deals 1992 Death damage over 16s. Increases the chance for damage over time abilities to critically hit the enemy by 3%. Drains Charge while active (does not block Charge gain).
Interrupts.
Deals 482 Death damage whenever the enemy uses an ability. Can occur up to 5 times. Lasts 15s.
Interrupts the enemy and Debilitates for 5s.

Deals 1091 to 1206 Death damage after 8s. If a damage over time effect is cleansed from the enemy, Neddra's Torture explodes dealing 1422 to 1571 Death damage to the cleanser and Debilitating them for 3s. Can occur a number of times equal to half the number of the Mage's Death based damage over time effects on the enemy plus 1. Max 4 procs.
Increases Endurance by 70 on all party or raid members. Lasts 1h.
Restores 7% mana. Consumes 7% health.
Increases the Mage's damage by 1% for each point spent in the Warlock soul.
Fears for 10s or until damaged. Can only affect 1 enemy.
Reduces damage taken by 80% for 7s.
Deals 874 to 965 Death damage. Counts as a Primary Bolt.
